name: reoxygenate
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to put oxygen back into something: Chemicals are added to reoxygenate the water. The blood is re-oxygenated and returned to the patient's body. Related words
oxygenate
reoxygenation
More examplesFewer examplesThe water is re-oxygenated before it enters the main tank.They set up a series of pumps along the bank in an attempt to re-oxygenate the river.She was treated in a special chamber that reoxygenates the blood.After a long match he will sit in an ice bath to re-oxygenate his muscles.
